sense.def:
Izraz
nothing
pomeni, da stvari določene vrste, na primer predmetov, dogodkov ali idej, ni.

seg.quote: She shook the bottle over the glass; nothing came out.
The man nodded but said nothing.

sense.def:
Kadar za kaj rečemo, da je to
nothing
, pomeni, da je zelo nepomembno.

seg.quote: ‘What's the matter with you?’ Claud asked. ‘It's nothing,’ he gasped.

sense.def:
Nothing but a particular thing
pomeni samo tista stvar.

seg.quote: She could see nothing but his head.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
nothing of the sort
poudarimo negativni odgovor ali nikalno trditev.

seg.quote: You will do nothing of the sort.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
nothing if not
poudarimo, da ima neka oseba ali stvar določeno lastnost v veliki meri. Na primer, če za koga rečemo, da je
nothing if not considerate
, pomeni, da je zelo obziren;

seg.quote: There was nothing for it now except to go straight ahead with the plan.
